CustomField.formula: IF (AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Returned_Date__c)), Hold_Duration__c < Days_Of_Hold_Allowed__c ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green Flag"), IF (Hold_Duration__c < Days_Of_Hold_Allowed__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif","Yellow Flag"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif","Red Flag")))
CustomField.label: Status
